name: Jewel Race - Free
description:
In the jungle, everyone can hear your monster truck.

Collect gems in an inaccessible jungle. Load them on the truck and drive towards the goal. Your efforts can save the inhabitants of the country.

How to play:

Press the gas or brake to run forward or reverse. Rotate your phone or pad to get the car reared.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

Thanks and attribution:
